Text.Page:
Safna was on his way here to confront me? I'm glad you found him first. You may have saved his life—and not from panthers, either.

Well, if he still wants astrocorn fungus, look around here and you may be able to find some.
I don't see any poisonous ones—these ought to make Safna happy. I'll deliver them. It seems the least I can do. And take this for helping me out.
<font color='#660000'>Astrocorn fungus</font> grows here and there in the northern part of Feral Valley.
